article: Dear May, How are you? I'm writing to you at my school. I'm a middle school  _  . I am in a big class. There  _  about sixty teachers. My English teacher is Miss Gao. She is a  _  teacher .She  _  helps us with English. We go to school  _  Monday to Friday .There are four classes in the morning and three in the afternoon .We like to  _  between classes. I have some friends at school .One of my friends is from  _  . She speaks English. She is friendly  _  us. I usually play with  _  .We often play basketball. It is my favorite  _  . Please write soon. Lin Tao
